36namespace webrtc {
37namespace {
38
39using MixingBuffer =
40 std::array<std::array<float, FrameCombiner::kMaximumChannelSize>,
41 FrameCombiner::kMaximumNumberOfChannels>;
42
43void SetAudioFrameFields(rtc::ArrayView<const AudioFrame* const> mix_list,
44 size_t number_of_channels,
45 int sample_rate,
46 size_t number_of_streams,
47 AudioFrame* audio_frame_for_mixing) {
48 const size_t samples_per_channel = static_cast<size_t>(
49 (sample_rate * webrtc::AudioMixerImpl::kFrameDurationInMs) / 1000);
50
51 // TODO(minyue): Issue bugs.webrtc.org/3390.
52 // Audio frame timestamp. The 'timestamp_' field is set to dummy
53 // value '0', because it is only supported in the one channel case and
54 // is then updated in the helper functions.
55 audio_frame_for_mixing->UpdateFrame(
56 0, nullptr, samples_per_channel, sample_rate, AudioFrame::kUndefined,
57 AudioFrame::kVadUnknown, number_of_channels);
58
59 if (mix_list.empty()) {
60 audio_frame_for_mixing->elapsed_time_ms_ = -1;
61 } else {
62 audio_frame_for_mixing->timestamp_ = mix_list[0]->timestamp_;
63 audio_frame_for_mixing->elapsed_time_ms_ = mix_list[0]->elapsed_time_ms_;
64 audio_frame_for_mixing->ntp_time_ms_ = mix_list[0]->ntp_time_ms_;
65 std::vector<RtpPacketInfo> packet_infos;
66 for (const auto& frame : mix_list) {
67 audio_frame_for_mixing->timestamp_ =
68 std::min(audio_frame_for_mixing->timestamp_, frame->timestamp_);
69 audio_frame_for_mixing->ntp_time_ms_ =
70 std::min(audio_frame_for_mixing->ntp_time_ms_, frame->ntp_time_ms_);
71 audio_frame_for_mixing->elapsed_time_ms_ = std::max(
72 audio_frame_for_mixing->elapsed_time_ms_, frame->elapsed_time_ms_);
73 packet_infos.insert(packet_infos.end(), frame->packet_infos_.begin(),
74 frame->packet_infos_.end());
75 }
76 audio_frame_for_mixing->packet_infos_ =
77 RtpPacketInfos(std::move(packet_infos));
78 }
79}
80
81void MixFewFramesWithNoLimiter(rtc::ArrayView<const AudioFrame* const> mix_list,
82 AudioFrame* audio_frame_for_mixing) {
83 if (mix_list.empty()) {
84 audio_frame_for_mixing->Mute();
85 return;
86 }
87 RTC_DCHECK_LE(mix_list.size(), 1);
88 std::copy(mix_list[0]->data(),
89 mix_list[0]->data() +
90 mix_list[0]->num_channels_ * mix_list[0]->samples_per_channel_,
91 audio_frame_for_mixing->mutable_data());
92}
93
94void MixToFloatFrame(rtc::ArrayView<const AudioFrame* const> mix_list,
95 size_t samples_per_channel,
96 size_t number_of_channels,
97 MixingBuffer* mixing_buffer) {
98 RTC_DCHECK_LE(samples_per_channel, FrameCombiner::kMaximumChannelSize);
99 RTC_DCHECK_LE(number_of_channels, FrameCombiner::kMaximumNumberOfChannels);
100 // Clear the mixing buffer.
101 for (auto& one_channel_buffer : *mixing_buffer) {
102 std::fill(one_channel_buffer.begin(), one_channel_buffer.end(), 0.f);
103 }
104
105 // Convert to FloatS16 and mix.
106 for (size_t i = 0; i < mix_list.size(); ++i) {
107 const AudioFrame* const frame = mix_list[i];
108 const int16_t* const frame_data = frame->data();
109 for (size_t j = 0; j < std::min(number_of_channels,
110 FrameCombiner::kMaximumNumberOfChannels);
111 ++j) {
112 for (size_t k = 0; k < std::min(samples_per_channel,
113 FrameCombiner::kMaximumChannelSize);
114 ++k) {
115 (*mixing_buffer)[j][k] += frame_data[number_of_channels * k + j];
116 }
117 }
118 }
119}
120
121void RunLimiter(AudioFrameView<float> mixing_buffer_view, Limiter* limiter) {
122 const size_t sample_rate = mixing_buffer_view.samples_per_channel() * 1000 /
123 AudioMixerImpl::kFrameDurationInMs;
124 // TODO(alessiob): Avoid calling SetSampleRate every time.
125 limiter->SetSampleRate(sample_rate);
126 limiter->Process(mixing_buffer_view);
127}
128
129// Both interleaves and rounds.
130void InterleaveToAudioFrame(AudioFrameView<const float> mixing_buffer_view,
131 AudioFrame* audio_frame_for_mixing) {
132 const size_t number_of_channels = mixing_buffer_view.num_channels();
133 const size_t samples_per_channel = mixing_buffer_view.samples_per_channel();
134 int16_t* const mixing_data = audio_frame_for_mixing->mutable_data();
135 // Put data in the result frame.
136 for (size_t i = 0; i < number_of_channels; ++i) {
137 for (size_t j = 0; j < samples_per_channel; ++j) {
138 mixing_data[number_of_channels * j + i] =
139 FloatS16ToS16(mixing_buffer_view.channel(i)[j]);
140 }
141 }
142}
143} // namespace
144
145constexpr size_t FrameCombiner::kMaximumNumberOfChannels;
146constexpr size_t FrameCombiner::kMaximumChannelSize;
147
148FrameCombiner::FrameCombiner(bool use_limiter)
149 : data_dumper_(new ApmDataDumper(0)),
150 mixing_buffer_(
151 std::make_unique<std::array<std::array<float, kMaximumChannelSize>,
152 kMaximumNumberOfChannels>>()),
153 limiter_(static_cast<size_t>(48000), data_dumper_.get(), "AudioMixer"),
154 use_limiter_(use_limiter) {
155 static_assert(kMaximumChannelSize * kMaximumNumberOfChannels <=
156 AudioFrame::kMaxDataSizeSamples,
157 "");
158}
159
160FrameCombiner::~FrameCombiner() = default;
161
162void FrameCombiner::Combine(rtc::ArrayView<AudioFrame* const> mix_list,
163 size_t number_of_channels,
164 int sample_rate,
165 size_t number_of_streams,
166 AudioFrame* audio_frame_for_mixing) {
167 RTC_DCHECK(audio_frame_for_mixing);
168
169 LogMixingStats(mix_list, sample_rate, number_of_streams);
170
171 SetAudioFrameFields(mix_list, number_of_channels, sample_rate,
172 number_of_streams, audio_frame_for_mixing);
173
174 const size_t samples_per_channel = static_cast<size_t>(
175 (sample_rate * webrtc::AudioMixerImpl::kFrameDurationInMs) / 1000);
176
177 for (const auto* frame : mix_list) {
178 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(samples_per_channel, frame->samples_per_channel_);
179 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(sample_rate, frame->sample_rate_hz_);
180 }
181
182 // The 'num_channels_' field of frames in 'mix_list' could be
183 // different from 'number_of_channels'.
184 for (auto* frame : mix_list) {
185 RemixFrame(number_of_channels, frame);
186 }
187
188 if (number_of_streams <= 1) {
189 MixFewFramesWithNoLimiter(mix_list, audio_frame_for_mixing);
190 return;
191 }
192
193 MixToFloatFrame(mix_list, samples_per_channel, number_of_channels,
194 mixing_buffer_.get());
195
196 const size_t output_number_of_channels =
197 std::min(number_of_channels, kMaximumNumberOfChannels);
198 const size_t output_samples_per_channel =
199 std::min(samples_per_channel, kMaximumChannelSize);
200
201 // Put float data in an AudioFrameView.
202 std::array<float*, kMaximumNumberOfChannels> channel_pointers{};
203 for (size_t i = 0; i < output_number_of_channels; ++i) {
204 channel_pointers[i] = &(*mixing_buffer_.get())[i][0];
205 }
206 AudioFrameView<float> mixing_buffer_view(&channel_pointers[0],
207 output_number_of_channels,
208 output_samples_per_channel);
209
210 if (use_limiter_) {
211 RunLimiter(mixing_buffer_view, &limiter_);
212 }
213
214 InterleaveToAudioFrame(mixing_buffer_view, audio_frame_for_mixing);
215}
216
217void FrameCombiner::LogMixingStats(
218 rtc::ArrayView<const AudioFrame* const> mix_list,
219 int sample_rate,
220 size_t number_of_streams) const {
221 // Log every second.
222 uma_logging_counter_++;
223 if (uma_logging_counter_ > 1000 / AudioMixerImpl::kFrameDurationInMs) {
224 uma_logging_counter_ = 0;
225 RTC_HISTOGRAM_COUNTS_100("WebRTC.Audio.AudioMixer.NumIncomingStreams",
226 static_cast<int>(number_of_streams));
227 RTC_HISTOGRAM_COUNTS_LINEAR(
228 "WebRTC.Audio.AudioMixer.NumIncomingActiveStreams2",
229 rtc::dchecked_cast<int>(mix_list.size()), /*min=*/1, /*max=*/16,
230 /*bucket_count=*/16);
231
232 using NativeRate = AudioProcessing::NativeRate;
233 static constexpr NativeRate native_rates[] = {
234 NativeRate::kSampleRate8kHz, NativeRate::kSampleRate16kHz,
235 NativeRate::kSampleRate32kHz, NativeRate::kSampleRate48kHz};
236 const auto* rate_position = std::lower_bound(
237 std::begin(native_rates), std::end(native_rates), sample_rate);
238 RTC_HISTOGRAM_ENUMERATION(
239 "WebRTC.Audio.AudioMixer.MixingRate",
240 std::distance(std::begin(native_rates), rate_position),
241 arraysize(native_rates));
242 }
243}
